item.title: Voting Open for the 2013 Top VMware & Virtualization Blogs
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description:
Eric Siebert has yet again gone through the massive job of setting up his yearlyÂ Top VMware & Virtualization Blogs Vote. Huge kudos to Eric, I know this is a big undertaking for you, and myself and the rest of the community really appreciate the hard work you put into this each year!
Go ahead and cast your vote before the cut-off date of March 1st. vNinja.net is listed in the general section, feel free to vote for us if you feel like we deserve it.
